edu.kit.scc.dem.wapsrv.model

Interface FormattableObject

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    Annotation, AnnotationList, Container, Page, WapObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RdfAnnotation, RdfAnnotationList, RdfContainer, RdfOutputContainer, RdfPage, RdfWapObject

    public interface FormattableObject
    Everything that need to have a String serialization for usage in HTTP response bodies has to implement this interface.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Matthias Dressel, Michael Hitzker, Markus Hoefler, Andreas Loeffler, Timo Schmidt

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  FormattableObject.Type
      The different types of formattable objects that may exist

      Gets the type of the formattable object

      Returns a String serialization in the given format
